name: Auto Store, Home Supply Stores
tcc: R for face-to-face transactions.\nT for nonâ€“face-to-face transactions.
description:
Merchants that sell a variety of merchandise for home and
automobile repair and improvement. Products for sale may include
new automobile tires, batteries, and other automobile parts and
accessories, as well as home appliances, equipment, and supplies.
For merchants that sell home products and supplies in warehouse-
type stores, use MCC 5200.
For merchants that sell automotive parts, equipment, and related
accessories, use MCC 5533.
